name: Happy Pads
description: Happy Sisters offers eco-friendly feminine hygiene products with patented leak-proof designs. Our 100% biodegradable pads and tampons have 10 advanced features, including antibacterial components and free BV self-test kits.
one_liner: Happy Sisters offers eco-friendly feminine hygiene products with patented leak-proof designs. Our 100% biodegradable pads and tampons have 10 advanced features, including antibacterial components and free BV self-test kits.
